channel.title: Storybooks Nigeria
channel.description: Storybooks Nigeria is designed specifically for teachers and makes 40 stories from the African Storybook available in English and Swahili, as well as all the major regional and immigrant languages of Nigeria (with text and audio in Amharic, Arabic, Embu / Kîembu, English, Gujarati, Ekegusii, Kamba / Kikamba, Gikuyu / Kikuyu, Kalenjin, Luganda, Olukhayo, Luo / Dholuo, Luhya / Oluluhya, Pokomo / Kipfokomo, Maa / Maasai, Meru / Kimîîru, Giryama / Kigiryama, Oromo / Afaan Oromo, Rendille, Samburu, Somali, Swahili / Kiswahili, and Turkana / Ng‘aturkana).
